website_summaries.verdict: Another old-school design from Fila, but it doesn't have the same comfort and durability as other styles.
pros: Looks great, but most comfortable when worn for a few hours at a time
Not recommended for a full day of walking
Leather uppers with perforated toe box
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Run small, so consider this when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Fedex Smartpost Is A No
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the shoe on the 4th of January and got them on January 16. Other than that, I like the shoe, It was a little small for a size 9 but it wasnt too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried these on. Immediately I have an issue with the FACT that the add clearly reads "leather". The tongue on the shoes clearly reads " Synthetic leather". This hacks...me...off! I did NOT pay for synthetic leather. I do not care how the shoe fits! It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Brown Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit but tongue is not even fixed to the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look good
customer_reviews.text: Had the red pair a long time ago. Wanted another pair for summer. Ended up getting the blue pair also. They are not l00% leather as advertised, but still gonna keep them. They look and feel good. My foot is a little wide but they feel okay. I hope they hold up and are true cause I probably won't really wear them until close to summer and I know the return policy will be expired.
customer_reviews.author: Kikigreen

customer_reviews.title: I have had many shoes by Fila and enjoyed them all except these.
customer_reviews.text: When I put them on and walked they squeaked. I thought after wearing just a bit they would stop but they didn't. I tried trimming the insole that didn't work. And I even removed the insole and replaced them with some off the shelf. Still didn't fix it so I guess I will only wear them in an environment where there will be lots of noise. I should have sent them back but now after wearing them I guess I am stuck, but not happy with this purchase. I will buy more Fila shoes in the future but not these.
customer_reviews.author: John Martin

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely well constructed and good looking but to me they are about a size ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent these shoes back and did not exchange. I ordered and received the size I normally wear but the minute I put them on I knew they were not for me. They are extremely well constructed and good looking but to me they are about a size too narrow and the stiff leather is unforgiving. If you are willing to work through an extensive break-in time, they might work just fine for you but I would order the next width.
customer_reviews.author: bbezenek

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: The leather on this shoe immediately started peeling on the first day. Quality of leather is poor as if someone sprayed on some type of paint on the shoe because I could not get a solid 3 hours of wear before the leather started peeling. I am asking for a full refund on the shoes and WILL NOT buy from this site again. I should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but wow! Beautiful leather, color and fit! I bought the mens shoe for myself because they fit better than women's shoes. These are so comfortable I just love them. There's a conversion chart for these I think. I wear a size 9 in women's shoes, I bought a 8.5 in mens and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Debby P.

customer_reviews.title: Great look but limited comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great looking throwback shoe that I like to wear with my jeans. The shoe is very stiff and offers little support however. It's hard for me to wear these all day but they are perfect for going out for a night. They don't get too uncomfortable but if you will be doing a lot of walking you should probably wear something else.
customer_reviews.author: StavKav

customer_reviews.title: Always love and Old School tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: I used to have these shoes back in the 80s so I bought my son and my boyfriend a pair for Father's Day description not as described I don't know what type of leather this is but it does not look like the original shoes I knew it had to be faulty too good to be true not good quality of leather
customer_reviews.author: Lashon

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in size 9.5. When it arrived and I opened the box, I fell in love with it right away without even trying it on. So glade I ordered the black with the red and white. Even my wife and daughter likes my new shoes, looks good in me they said. The only minor complaint I have is I wish it was a little bit wider. But I could live with it. And I'm keeping it. Shipping arrived pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: David Oma

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sneakers I own
customer_reviews.text: I wore these in high school. I didn't realize how comfortable they were then. I appreciate them fully now. I have a ton of custom sneakers. I have custom Italian sneakers made just for me. I have Ewing's, and Nike BY You Airforce 1. Gary Vee K-Swiss. These Filas are the most comfortable pair of sneakers I own. I have two pairs. In White and Black. I hope they never stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Buddhagunz365

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is Exactly What My Son Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why it is so difficult to find shoes like this in interesting colors in size 12. Luckily we found Fila and Eric and Chad. I bought these to surprise my adult son for his birthday and he's so happy. Thank you Eric and Chad for your customer service and timely delivery! You are wonderful! Oh! Did I mention that I waited only two days for these? Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: MAnderson

customer_reviews.title: fav pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: i got the all white pair(except where it says fila it’s navy/red) and they look soo good. i originally got sz 13 cuz i read they fit small but that pair was too big so i got my regular size since there’s no 12.5 and they fit pretty nice. there’s not a lot of extra space so i thought they’d be uncomfy but it wasn’t really an issue while wearing them. i do have skinnyish feet tho so i’d recommend a half sz up if u can.
customer_reviews.author: sk8rat97

customer_reviews.title: A Little Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Although the O.F. Lea is a little narrow compared FILA court shoes (Navarro & Rovello), and I can't imagine actually using them for any kind of athletic activity, they are a great looking casual show at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: 1willfulwolf

customer_reviews.title: will never buy K Swiss again-ever
customer_reviews.text: Kswiss has a manufacturing glitch. Sent a $65 pair back to them at the listed L.A.Address but they came back to my house. PO said wrong address. FILA is the new # 1choice for style, comfort and beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Merrel Wilkenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Love  these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m skinny, as are my feet, so these shoes don’t feel tight, plus I tend to wear my shoes lose anyway. The style is awesome, I bought the white ones. A lot of people also said the shoes are too stiff and that they really need to be broken in, but that depends on how you tie your shoes and wear them I guess. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Old Skool Fila's the Best
customer_reviews.text: as unexpensive the tennis shoes were the quality and style still better than any of those $100 plus tennis shoes. I will never spend that kind of money for tennis shoes like that. Thank you Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: DLopez

customer_reviews.title: they are really nice shoes, personally just second guessing the decision to ...
customer_reviews.text: they are really nice shoes, personally just second guessing the decision to buy red shoes I probably won't again, haha. still they look good and i'll wear them occasionally
customer_reviews.author: Satch

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Advertised as all white with colered fila logo. Yellowish color to the shoes. Dissapointed!!###!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dean cardoso...

customer_reviews.title: Fila gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box these are very comfortable shoes & look great too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Magnificent..!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way these Fila’s fit & looks on my feet..! Simply outstanding..! I give these shoes 5 Stars ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️...!
customer_reviews.author: Val Wells

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit, got them 6 months ago for my son and they are still holding up and he wears this pair a lot. Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Precious Knows

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect title/Description
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 12M which in my mind is size for men because title says Fila Men’s Original, I received a size 12 that my 4 year old could fit. I returned them and waiting on refund.
customer_reviews.author: Yansel

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe. It is stylish with out being overly extreme looking. Everyone comments on how nice they look.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable sizing amiss
customer_reviews.text: Sizing all wrong. Nearly a full size too small. No arch support, super tight in toe area. Overly narrow
customer_reviews.author: AeroEng

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: The size is 12 but I gave the shoes to my cousin who’s shoe size is 10.5 and it fit him perfectly. Overall it’s still a nice looking sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dejesus

customer_reviews.title: They look really good
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, they look real nice. Unfortunately I sent them back because I changed my mind for personal reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Floridagal

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 11 for my son and it's too small. Must run small. I will return and order a size up. Great looking shoe for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Classic Shoe - Order up in your shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe and shipping was super fast! However, Fila apparently runs really small. I had to return this men's 7 pair (typically women's 8 1/2 equivalent) for a larger size. I ordered 1/2 size larger, which I'm going to make work, but realistically, I probably should have increased by an entire shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Karla W

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and they fit true to size. They loved them!
customer_reviews.author: The Rambling Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Great old school look
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a larger size and had to return it but great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Julio L Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Get a wide or don't get it
customer_reviews.text: The Sneaker was nice but way to small for my feet, I'm a 9.5 medium and the where too tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rafyraf

customer_reviews.title: Love it, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Excellent quality and fast shipping! Great for the price! Thank you so much👍
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: The perfect red sneaker that my son was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a red sneaker. He really like this Fila that I found on Amazon. Great sneaker and really nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Patty G

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and stylish!! I wanted another pair as a gift but they doubled in price!
customer_reviews.author: Sy Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's a well made sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Bought them for my son. I ordered his size and it fit him perfectly. He loves the smooth leather finish.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Melville-Trotman

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong size!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered a men’s shoe in a size 12 the invoice even shows I ordered a 12 in men! I RECEIVED A 12 IN KIDS. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rena❤️

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same soft leather shoe from it's initial production. Just as I remembered them. Get them while the good times roll.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Keep everything in sync
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is good but it was sent in a regular cardboard shoebox instead of a fila shoebox.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: my favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: have lots of shoes. these are special! the very best. thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Jim C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered sneakers before online I always ordered size 9, I ordered 9s they were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Minton

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.text: It's an 80s style shoe that does not have the crazy colors you see today. I prefer white with red and blue trim. The cushioning and comfort of this shoe does not compare to more recent technology (but that is the trade-off for the stye and color). Overall, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN A S

customer_reviews.title: Timeless sneaker...
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather sneaker....got my first pair when I was 30 years old....in 1980 and the quality is still the same today in 2019...Very satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: MarkR

customer_reviews.title: Leather Cracking and peeling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes one month ago for back to school - they have only been worn a couple hours and the leather is already cracking and peeling. I wanted to get a refund but that is not showing up as an option, due to me shopping early.
customer_reviews.author: Aimes

customer_reviews.title: So nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Picture is accurate and design is awesome! Fits well and good traction. I wish the inside was a bit softer but $5 Dr Scholl's make them great for city walking. Awesome buy for $30
customer_reviews.author: Milarsaurus

customer_reviews.title: He is happy with this shoe....
customer_reviews.text: My love the look of this shoes and started having me buy fila again!!
customer_reviews.author: Shakayla. M. G

customer_reviews.title: Look, fit and style.
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous shoes. I get compliments all the time.
customer_reviews.author: R's Goods

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. Their colorful, eye catching and brings back the nostalgia of my youth. Good craftsmanship. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: The_8th_Wonder!

customer_reviews.title: By a half size or a full size bigger. ...
customer_reviews.text: By a half size or a full size bigger. I wish I would have known at the time because now they don't have the size I need anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Ace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Great Fit! Look just like picture.

customer_reviews.title: Good  product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, fit a little tight for me that I have a wide feet
customer_reviews.author: MELVIN

customer_reviews.title: Fila men’s shoes
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early and look exactly like the ones in the picture from the item page.
customer_reviews.author: Danyal Lodhi

customer_reviews.title: Their stylish and very comfortable. Looking at purchasing another pair in cream
customer_reviews.text: They brought 87 back! I had to get these. Their stylish and very comfortable. Looking at purchasing another pair in cream.
customer_reviews.author: McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Well-made shoe for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoe. I bought these shoes for my husband because he always wanted a pair as a child, but never got them. He was ecstatic! He loves the shoes and wears them all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Demon reader

customer_reviews.title: Very very vintage
customer_reviews.text: They look very vintage. The sole is Black. The paint of Fila letters from the racks comes off very quickly. Violin (differ?) when walking. Overall - satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg_val

customer_reviews.title: Throwbacks
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these back in middle school, and when they came back in style I just had to have a pair. Love them.

customer_reviews.title: Classic!
customer_reviews.text: I love classic Filas. They are retro and still have the same good quality from the 80s
customer_reviews.author: MsMiamiMami

customer_reviews.title: Keep them coming !
customer_reviews.text: Love my Fila ! Another Old School sneaker! That's my thang !
customer_reviews.author: Jonanthony Dyson

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I got the 9.5 cus my husband wears a 9 but they was too tight so I was gonna return but after he kept wearing them they loosend up
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Angel

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best looking white sneakers by far. You can't beat a gum rubber sole.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Price

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but, Go a half to whole size bigger than what you're use to.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself was nice, but the size was smaller than my usual 9 1/2. I suggest going a half to whole size bigger than what you normally wear. But the show itself is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sir R.

customer_reviews.title: Less than expected
customer_reviews.text: Came with little scuffs. Poor stitching. Fresh out the box. Would buy again if they were in tip top shape but I've gotten better shoes for the same price where they take care with the shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Nice I'm kinda feeling these here
customer_reviews.text: Never had fila shoes before so I figure I'll try them out and see what all the hype all about and I bought 2 of them

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves them. Her friends compliment how nice they are all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Fila Men's Original Fitness Lea Classic Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a size 13 and he loved the shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a month ago just opened the box 1 shoe is black the other has a gray square on it I'm sure I'm out of money for this order
customer_reviews.author: Ralph B.

customer_reviews.title: Excited about them
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to see them available again, and they were just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Niecey B.

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of how small these shoes fit
customer_reviews.text: Appeared very well constructed, but the sizing is WAY smaller than numbers would indicate. I wear 11 in Reebok ex-o -fit lo, so I ordered 11.5 just to give myself some leeway. 11.5 was at least a full size too small. Easy return process, no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Bufford D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to buy a half-size bigger than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I love Fila's and as usual they look Hotter in person then even in the Pic. Just BE SURE to buy a half size larger than you wear with typical other brands.

customer_reviews.title: Just like I bought them from the mall!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my spouse for Christmas- he loves them! AWESOME!

customer_reviews.title: It should be real leather
customer_reviews.text: The product was alright but I thought they was real leather,if it was I would give the product a 5.it should be real leather

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Looks just as pictured. The shoe is kinda stiff but besides that, I am completely satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: I love them. Great color
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are 90's throwbacks. I love them. Great color, quality, and fit.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for me  :(
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wider shoe. These only come in D width. Otherwise they appeared to be well made.

product_meta.title: Fila Men's Original Fitness Lea Classic Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Fila's classic casual styles feel good on your feet walking around town and look good with your favorite athletic and fashion apparel.

Hit the streets running in Fila's Original Fitness sneaker. With its old-school look, bold styling, and logo detailing, this comfortable style is ultra-cool. Everyone else will be left scrambling to pick up the fashion pace you've set.

Fila began in 1911, in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles, and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inexorably derived from Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury and elegance. This is our birthright, it's in our soul, and it defines our future. We continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for our existence. We create what is desired, not what is necessary. Not just enough, but more than you need. This is Fila.

See more
feature_bullets: Midsole - eva for cushioning and comfort
Outsole - solid rubber provides traction and durability
Classic heritage style with fashionable looks
Select distribution and unique product assortment
